id: Schedules/Standards for Processing by the State and for Specified Purposes
title: Schedule II: Standards for Processing by the State and for Specified Purposes
description: Schedule II sets the baseline standards that must be followed when the State or its instrumentalities process personal data. This is especially important because government bodies in India handle vast volumes of sensitive data â€” from Aadhaar numbers and tax records to health data, welfare entitlements, and educational records.
